channel.title: Introducing the Challenge Solver Badges
channel.description:
Hello 0x00ers!
Recently, we have added new badges to the site that are awarded to people who solve the challenges posted here.
Currently, these badges are:
* [Tier 0 Challenge Solver](https://0x00sec.org/badges/111/tier-0-challenge-solver) * [Tier 1 Challenge Solver](https://0x00sec.org/badges/112/tier-1-challenge-solver)
More will be added when enough people earn these badges...
-- @oaktree

item.title: Introducing the Challenge Solver Badges
item.dc:creator: oaktree
item.description:
Hello 0x00ers!

Recently, we have added new badges to the site that are awarded to people who solve the challenges posted here.

Currently, these badges are:

  • Tier 0 Challenge Solver
  • Tier 1 Challenge Solver

More will be added when enough people earn these badges…
